- function searchKnowledge(query) {
-     const results = [];
-     query = query.toLowerCase();
-     
-     Object.entries(knowledgeBase).forEach(([catKey, category]) =&gt; {
-         if (category.subcategories) {
-             Object.entries(category.subcategories).forEach(([subKey, subcategory]) =&gt; {
-                 subcategory.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
-                     if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
-                         results.push({
-                             categoryTitle: category.title,
-                             subcategoryTitle: subcategory.title,
-                             article: article
-                         });
-                     }
-                 });
-             });
-         } else if (category.articles) {
-             category.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
-                 if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
-                     results.push({
-                         categoryTitle: category.title,
-                         subcategoryTitle: null,
-                         article: article
-                     });
-                 }
-             });
-         }
-     });
-     
-     return results;
- }

- function findArticle(title) {
-     for (const [catKey, category] of Object.entries(knowledgeBase)) {
-         if (category.subcategories) {
-             for (const [subKey, subcategory] of Object.entries(category.subcategories)) {

-                 if (article) {

-                         data: article,
-                         categoryTitle: category.title,
-                         subcategoryTitle: subcategory.title

-             const article = category.articles.find(a =&gt; a.title === title);

+ function getViewCount(articleTitle) {
+     const views = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('articleViews') || '{}');
+     return views[articleTitle] || 0;
+ }

+ function incrementViewCount(articleTitle) {
+     const views = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('articleViews') || '{}');
+     views[articleTitle] = (views[articleTitle] || 0) + 1;
+     localStorage.setItem('articleViews', JSON.stringify(views));
+     return views[articleTitle];
+ }

+ // ===== ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢ =====
+ function initTheme() {
+     const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
+     document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', savedTheme);
+     
+     themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+         const current = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
+         const next = current === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
+         document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', next);
+         localStorage.setItem('theme', next);
+     });
+ }

+     document.querySelectorAll('.nav-group-title').forEach(title =&gt; {

+     document.querySelectorAll('.nav-subgroup-title').forEach(title =&gt; {

+     document.querySelectorAll('.sidebar-nav .nav-link[data-article]').forEach(link =&gt; {

+ // ===== æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ =====
+ function initSearch() {
+     // é¡¶éƒ¨æœç´¢æ¡†
+     searchInput.addEventListener('focus', () =&gt; {
+         openSearchModal();
+     });
+     
+     // å¿«æ·é”®æ‰“å¼€æœç´¢
+     document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) =&gt; {
+         if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) &amp;&amp; e.key === 'k') {

+     searchModal.addEventListener('click', (e) =&gt; {

+     // æœç´¢è¾“å…¥
+     modalSearchInput.addEventListener('input', (e) =&gt; {

+         }
+     });
+ }

+ function openSearchModal() {
+     searchModal.classList.add('active');
+     modalSearchInput.focus();
+ }

+ function closeSearchModal() {
+     searchModal.classList.remove('active');
+     modalSearchInput.value = '';
+     document.getElementById('modalSearchResults').innerHTML = '';

+ function performSearch(query) {
+     const results = searchKnowledge(query);
+     const resultsContainer = document.getElementById('modalSearchResults');
+     
+     if (results.length === 0) {
+         resultsContainer.innerHTML = '&lt;div style="padding: 20px; text-align: center; color: var(--c-text-mute);"&gt;æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸å…³ç»“æœ&lt;/div&gt;';
+         return;
+     }
+     
+     resultsContainer.innerHTML = results.slice(0, 10).map(result =&gt; &#96;
+         &lt;div class="modal-result-item" onclick="selectSearchResult('${result.article.title}')"&gt;
+             &lt;span class="modal-result-icon"&gt;ğŸ“„&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;div class="modal-result-text"&gt;
+                 &lt;div class="modal-result-title"&gt;${result.article.title}&lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;div class="modal-result-path"&gt;${result.categoryTitle} ${result.subcategoryTitle ? '&gt; ' + result.subcategoryTitle : ''}&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+     &#96;).join('');
+ }
+ 
+ function searchKnowledge(query) {
+     const results = [];
+     query = query.toLowerCase();
+     
+     Object.entries(knowledgeBase).forEach(([catKey, category]) =&gt; {
+         if (category.subcategories) {
+             Object.entries(category.subcategories).forEach(([subKey, subcategory]) =&gt; {
+                 subcategory.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
+                     if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
+                         results.push({
+                             categoryTitle: category.title,
+                             subcategoryTitle: subcategory.title,
+                             article: article
+                         });
+                     }
+                 });
+             });
+         } else if (category.articles) {
+             category.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
+                 if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
+                     results.push({
+                         categoryTitle: category.title,
+                         subcategoryTitle: null,
+                         article: article
+                     });
+                 }
+             });
+         }
+     });
+

+     document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) =&gt; {

+ function openSearchModal() {
+     searchModal.classList.add('active');
+     modalSearchInput.focus();

+ function closeSearchModal() {
+     searchModal.classList.remove('active');
+     modalSearchInput.value = '';
+     document.getElementById('modalSearchResults').innerHTML = '';

+ function performSearch(query) {
+     const results = searchKnowledge(query);
+     const resultsContainer = document.getElementById('modalSearchResults');
+     
+     if (results.length === 0) {
+         resultsContainer.innerHTML = '&lt;div style="padding: 20px; text-align: center; color: var(--c-text-mute);"&gt;æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸å…³ç»“æœ&lt;/div&gt;';
+         return;
+     }
+     
+     resultsContainer.innerHTML = results.slice(0, 10).map(result =&gt; &#96;
+         &lt;div class="modal-result-item" onclick="selectSearchResult('${result.article.title}')"&gt;
+             &lt;span class="modal-result-icon"&gt;ğŸ“„&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;div class="modal-result-text"&gt;
+                 &lt;div class="modal-result-title"&gt;${result.article.title}&lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;div class="modal-result-path"&gt;${result.categoryTitle} ${result.subcategoryTitle ? '&gt; ' + result.subcategoryTitle : ''}&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+     &#96;).join('');
+ }
+ 
+ function searchKnowledge(query) {
+     const results = [];
+     query = query.toLowerCase();
+     
+     Object.entries(knowledgeBase).forEach(([catKey, category]) =&gt; {
+         if (category.subcategories) {
+             Object.entries(category.subcategories).forEach(([subKey, subcategory]) =&gt; {
+             subcategory.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
+                     if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
+                     results.push({
+                         categoryTitle: category.title,
+                         subcategoryTitle: subcategory.title,
+                             article: article
+                     });
+                 }
+             });
+         });
+         } else if (category.articles) {
+             category.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
+                 if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
+                     results.push({
+                         categoryTitle: category.title,
+                         subcategoryTitle: null,
+                         article: article
+                     });
+                 }
+             });
+         }
+     });
+     
+     return results;
+ }
+ 
+ function matchArticle(article, query) {
+     return article.title.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
+            article.content.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
+            article.keywords.some(k =&gt; k.toLowerCase().includes(query));
+ }

- function findArticle(title) {

-                     categoryTitle: category.title,

-                 };

- function searchKnowledge(query) {
-     const results = [];
-     query = query.toLowerCase();

-     Object.entries(knowledgeBase).forEach(([catKey, category]) =&gt; {
-         if (category.subcategories) {
-             Object.entries(category.subcategories).forEach(([subKey, subcategory]) =&gt; {
-             subcategory.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {

-                         categoryTitle: category.title,
-                         subcategoryTitle: subcategory.title,
-                             article: article
-                     });

-         });
-         } else if (category.articles) {
-             category.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
-                 if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
-                     results.push({
-                         categoryTitle: category.title,
-                         subcategoryTitle: null,
-                         article: article
-                     });
-                 }
-             });
-         }
-     });
-     
-     return results;
- }

- function searchKnowledge(query) {

-         } else if (category.articles) {

-                         subcategoryTitle: null,
-                         article: article

+ // ===== æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ =====
+ function initSearch() {

+     searchInput.addEventListener('input', (e) =&gt; {

+     searchInput.addEventListener('focus', () =&gt; {

+         if (query.length &gt; 0) {

+             showSearchDropdown();
+         }
+     });

+             searchInput.blur();

+ function showSearchDropdown() {
+     searchDropdown.classList.add('active');
+ }

+ function hideSearchDropdown() {
+     searchDropdown.classList.remove('active');
+ }

+ function performSearch(query) {
+     const results = searchKnowledge(query);
+     
+     if (results.length === 0) {
+         searchDropdown.innerHTML = '&lt;div class="search-dropdown-empty"&gt;æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸å…³ç»“æœ&lt;/div&gt;';
+         return;
+     }
+     
+     searchDropdown.innerHTML = results.slice(0, 8).map(result =&gt; &#96;
+         &lt;div class="search-dropdown-item" onclick="selectSearchResult('${result.article.title}')"&gt;
+             &lt;span class="search-dropdown-icon"&gt;ğŸ“„&lt;/span&gt;
+             &lt;div class="search-dropdown-text"&gt;
+                 &lt;div class="search-dropdown-title"&gt;${result.article.title}&lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;div class="search-dropdown-path"&gt;${result.categoryTitle}${result.subcategoryTitle ? ' &gt; ' + result.subcategoryTitle : ''}&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+     &#96;).join('');
+ }
+ 
+ function searchKnowledge(query) {
+     const results = [];
+     query = query.toLowerCase();
+     
+     Object.entries(knowledgeBase).forEach(([catKey, category]) =&gt; {
+         if (category.subcategories) {
+             Object.entries(category.subcategories).forEach(([subKey, subcategory]) =&gt; {
+             subcategory.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
+                     if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
+                     results.push({
+                         categoryTitle: category.title,
+                         subcategoryTitle: subcategory.title,
+                             article: article
+                     });
+                 }
+             });
+         });
+         } else if (category.articles) {
+             category.articles.forEach(article =&gt; {
+                 if (matchArticle(article, query)) {
+                     results.push({
+                         categoryTitle: category.title,
+                         subcategoryTitle: null,
+                         article: article
+                     });
+                 }
+             });
+         }
+     });
+     
+     return results;
+ }
+ 
+ function matchArticle(article, query) {
+     return article.title.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
+            article.content.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
+            article.keywords.some(k =&gt; k.toLowerCase().includes(query));
+ }
+ 
+ function selectSearchResult(title) {
+     hideSearchDropdown();
+     searchInput.value = '';
+     searchInput.blur();
+     showArticle(title);
+ }
